title: Is there a future in automobile industry? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes, there is a future in the automobile industry. In the Automobile Industry too, technology can be used. There are the future scope and upcoming trends in the automobile industry. Using Artificial Intelligence and the Internet of things, the automobile industry introduces new features with an innovation. There are the Future Trends in Automobile Industry: 1. Continuously Increasing the Usage of Automotive Software: Automotive software can be used in the automotive industry which makes work easier and fast and with the help of software that communicates with the owner and customer. Automotive software available and mostly used such as 5iQ Workshop Software categorized into three parts: Desktop App:Admin can see the data of the technician app & customer app. Technician App:By the technician App, the technician can manage the whole business. They can generate an invoice, make a payment, etc. Customer App:The customer app assists a customer to book vehicles for garage services. 2. Usage-Based Insurance in Automotive: In the Automotive Industry, insurance is indeed for automotive vehicles. It is based on insurance how much amount of insurance companies will pay. 3. Electric Vehicles: Many start-ups are exploring the electric vehicle industry. Also, there are electrical mobility preferences to turn more enveloping and advanced mobility solutions. 4. Connected and Self - Driving Vehicles: Automotive technology is booming. AI-based elements will be applied in the coming years. Technical components like 4G, GPS, WiFi, Bluetooth, etc.

Future of an automobile engineer is very bright. Even if we say engines are replaced by motors that is fully electric vehicles still an automobile has a lot other things which needs engineering and for that we need engineers. Even if there is rise in self driven vehicles still we need automobile engineers for it. And automobile engineering is not limited to cars trucks and buses. There is a big market of construction site vehicles which have large industrial applications. For example, road rollers, JCB, tractors, other earth moving equipments. Farming equipments like harvester and many similar things to it. All comes under automobile branch and have wide variety of application and at least for the coming 100 years I dont see any jobless automobile engineers. The reason we are seeing jobless engineers is because in the last decade there have been number of new engineering colleges with very poor education. Students from such colleges whos basics aren't good don't get hired. My advice for you is if you really want a job in automobile field. Expand your horizon widely. While doing engineering pay attention to all basics of studies you should know all the formulae and derivatives. Your industrial exposure should be good. You should be aware of the new concepts and technologies of the field. Edit 1: 25/05/2017 This answer has been sent to 1000 plus people in quora digest.
